name: Secret Wallet
description: macOS Keychain-based credential manager plugin with selective inject and gated write tools.

binaryPath.description: Absolute path to secret-wallet binary (or omit to use PATH)

allowInjectTool.description: Enable command execution tool (`secret_wallet_inject`). Default false.

binaryPath.label: Binary Path
binaryPath.help: Path to secret-wallet CLI binary. Leave empty to use system PATH.

allowWriteTools.label: Enable Write Tools
allowWriteTools.help: Allow secret_wallet_add and secret_wallet_remove (off by default).

allowInjectTool.label: Enable Inject Tool
allowInjectTool.help: Allow secret_wallet_inject (runs commands with selected secrets only).
